module.name: work_structure
module.keywords: module, systems engineering, project management, work

abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the pieces of work necessary to complete a project.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the pieces of work necessary to complete a project.

The Work_structure_arm contains the high level information basic to the work to be performed under contract. A formal legal contract may be present, or it may be informal and represent transfer of information and responsibility among product development teams. The contract is identified along with information associating activity or product data with the contract. The Work_structure_arm contains approval information, identification and status, associated with the contract, the product, and work activities. It defines the hierarchy of tasks to be performed along with required inputs and deliverable information or products. It contains the definition and quantification of planned as well as completed work outputs.
The Work_structure_arm contains the identification and characterization of a work request and a work order. It contains identification of the activities that are governed by a work order.

The work_structure_arm contains the definition of a security classification level and the assignment of a security classification level to any activity or product data. This capability supports both governmental security and business proprietary information.
